hero.core_tension: Compressed holiday surge vs durable loyalty: a concentrated decision window where short-term footfall must reveal lasting enrollments
hero.setting: Studio table near a large window; matte wood surface, satin packaging samples, printed floorplan overlays; low three-quarter angle, shallow depth
hero.persona: Brand owner (operator) and studio producer collaborating, leaning in with focused posture, no screens or literal UI
hero.action: Hands arranging limited-edition boxes, sliding schedule cards into a staggered grid while pointing to printed traffic tokens
hero.urgency_symbol: Overlapping light bands and converging pulses that narrow toward the frame edge to imply compressed timing
props: BNPL signage prototype in paper form (S3)
experiment label cards and footfall tokens
hero.lighting: Polished editorial with confident highlights, crisp rim light on faces, and clean negative space
hero.mood: Precise, collaborative, confident — intentional pause before action
hero.alt: Brand operator and studio lead over mockups, overlapping light bands signal compressed holiday timing

signal_map.structure: Concentric arcs and lattice of radial paths with labeled nodes (rings for windows, arcs for channels)
elements: node S1: dense urban pop-up window
node S3: BNPL + cash-back pilot node
signal_map.motion: Subtle pulsing along arcs with converging flow toward a central evaluation node, suggesting staggered windows and overlapping test timing
signal_map.palette: Matte paper and translucent acrylic materials, warm neutral base with confident accent tones (gold, deep teal), soft specular highlights
signal_map.alt: Abstract map of pulsing arcs and labeled nodes for S1–S4, suggesting converging test windows
